SENT.plain: Rituximab has improved the treatment of B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphomas
While it is generally well tolerated, serious adverse effects including infusion reactions with hemodynamic compromise and cardiac arrhythmias or ischemia are possible
We report a case of coronary vasospasm occurring during a rituximab infusion in a patient with minimal tumour burden and who had no cardiac risk factors
This case highlights that determination of the cause of ischemia is important and may identify some patients who can be successfully rechallenged
